shellshocker

Class Doors

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.Boundary
      • shellshocker.Doors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location

    public class Doors
extends Boundary
implements Location
    Creates door objects that can be opened by the user to allow access to different areas of the game map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Doors(int t, int x, int y, int length, int width, DoorOpener dO)
      Creates an door object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Doors

        public Doors(int t,
     int x,
     int y,
     int length,
     int width,
     DoorOpener dO)
        Creates an door object.
        Parameters:
        t - the type of door.
        x - the x-coordinate of the location of the door.
        y - the y-coordinate of the location of the door.
        length - the horizontal length of the door.
        width - the vertical width of the door.
